item.description:
INDOOR SKETCH GET-TOGETHER

WHEN: 1-2 hours starting at the posted time

RSVPs limited?: Yes

WHERE TO MEET: At the posted time, with 1/2 hour leeway for late-comers.

DIRECTIONS:
1. Route 3 South to Exit 6 Plymouth
2. Off the ramp take a right
3. Go about 1 mile into town to the lights on Main street
4. Take a right onto Main and go to the lights at the end of town (Kiskadee is on your right, but you need to park)
5. Take a right at the lights and park in the public lot ($ cheap)


THE SCENE: the funkiest coffee shop in New England. Live folk music on Saturdays (which means us), artwork for sale on the walls, home-roasted coffee, brick walls, San Francisco feel.

OTHER: This is more of a travel session, so please pack light, ideally nothing more than a 9x12 sketchbook. Dry media is strongly preferred, unless you are accustomed to working with brush in small settings. Also, expect that we will converse while we sketch, unlike most BPAAG meet-ups.


IF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call me. Save the number below (I myself always forget to do that, then I get there, and I'm clueless what the number was :) ).

Michael Emerald
617/968-0627
westpointusma@yahoo.com
item.name: INDOOR SKETCH GET-TOGETHER: Kiskadee Coffee Shop, Plymouth, MA
